title: Looking Directly at the Solar Eclipse
summary: Trump looked directly at the solar eclipse after being warned not to. Photos captured the moment. Everyone knows not to look directly at an eclipse without proper eye protection.
keyFacts: August 21, 2017: Looked directly at the solar eclipse
Had been warned not to look directly at it
Basic safety rule: Never look directly at a solar eclipse without proper eye protection
